text:
With #flu season colliding with #COVID19, ACP, @ACCinTouch, @pharmacists, & @TheEndoSociety urge all adults to get a flu #vaccine 💉 during #NationalInfluenzaVaccinationWeek and share why you recommend the #fluvaccine https://t.co/n6EePKpMLA.

#IRaiseTheRates #NIVW #FightFlu https://t.co/LTOTkTur1h
